vmm.pred
Interface VMMPredictor

All Known Implementing Classes:
BinaryCTWPredictor, DCTWPredictor, LZmsPredictor, PPMCPredictor, PSTPredictor
public interface VMMPredictor

Title: On prediction using VMM

Description: Variable Markov Model Code

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: Technion

Method Summary
 void learn(java.lang.CharSequence trainingSequence)
          This VMMPredictor use trainingSequence and consturcts its model.
 double logEval(java.lang.CharSequence testSequence)
          Predicts the log-likelihood of the testSequence, according to this VMMPredictor model (that was consturcted according to the training sequence).
 double predict(int symbol, java.lang.CharSequence context)
          Predicts the next symbol according to some context.
 

Method Detail

learn

public void learn(java.lang.CharSequence trainingSequence)
This VMMPredictor use trainingSequence and consturcts its model.

Parameters:
trainingSequence - a sequence

predict

public double predict(int symbol,
                      java.lang.CharSequence context)
Predicts the next symbol according to some context.

Parameters:
symbol - next symbol
context - a context sequence
Returns:
the likelihood prediction
Throws:
VMMNotTrainedException - when predicting without training

logEval

public double logEval(java.lang.CharSequence testSequence)
Predicts the log-likelihood of the testSequence, according to this VMMPredictor model (that was consturcted according to the training sequence).

Parameters:
testSequence - a sequence
Returns:
the -log( Probability (testSequence | trainingSequence) )
Throws:
VMMNotTrainedException - when predicting without training
